title: adidas Group - revenue from H1 2017 to H1 2019 , by region
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 3 different Halfs on X-axis for 6 groups Asia-Pacific, Europe, North America, Latin America, Emerging Markets, and Russia/CIS. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Revenue in million euros.
Out of all 6 groups, Asia-Pacific had the highest Revenue in million euros for Half 1st half 2019 and Russia/CIS had the lowest Revenue in million euros for Half 1st half 2018.
Half 1st half 2019 and 1st half 2017 had the biggest gap of 771.0 between the highest and lowest Revenue in million euros found for Asia-Pacific.

Averaging all 6 groups Asia-Pacific, Europe, North America, Latin America, Emerging Markets, and Russia/CIS, the Half 1st half 2019 is the maximum Revenue in million euros and 1st half 2017 is the minimum Revenue in million euros.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 3 different Halfs on X-axis for 6 groups Asia-Pacific, Europe, North America, Latin America, Emerging Markets, and Russia/CIS. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Revenue in million euros.
For Half 1st half 2019, Asia-Pacific had the highest Revenue in million euros 4011.0 among the 6 groups and in 1st half 2018, Russia/CIS had the lowest Revenue in million euros 297.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 3 different Halfs on X-axis for 6 groups Asia-Pacific, Europe, North America, Latin America, Emerging Markets, and Russia/CIS. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Revenue in million euros.
Out of all 6 groups, Asia-Pacific had the highest Revenue in million euros for Half 1st half 2019 and Russia/CIS had the lowest Revenue in million euros for Half 1st half 2018.
Half 1st half 2019 and 1st half 2017 had the biggest gap of 771.0 between the highest and lowest Revenue in million euros found for Asia-Pacific.

Averaging all 6 groups Asia-Pacific, Europe, North America, Latin America, Emerging Markets, and Russia/CIS, the Half 1st half 2019 is the maximum Revenue in million euros and 1st half 2017 is the minimum Revenue in million euros.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 3 different Halfs on X-axis for 6 groups Asia-Pacific, Europe, North America, Latin America, Emerging Markets, and Russia/CIS. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Revenue in million euros.
For Half 1st half 2019, Asia-Pacific had the highest Revenue in million euros 4011.0 among the 6 groups and in 1st half 2018, Russia/CIS had the lowest Revenue in million euros 297.0.
For Half 1st half 2019, Asia-Pacific had the highest Revenue in million euros among all 3 Halfs and it has the lowest Revenue in million euros in Half 1st half 2017.
Half 1st half 2019 and 1st half 2017 had the biggest gap of 771.0 between the highest and lowest Revenue in million euros found for Asia-Pacific.
Among the groups, Asia-Pacific had the biggest difference in Revenue in million euros. Where the maximum Revenue in million euros was 1.24 times larger than the minimum Revenue in million euros.

In case of Half 1st half 2019, Asia-Pacific had the highest Revenue in million euros 4011.0 among the 6 groups and in 1st half 2018, Russia/CIS had the lowest Revenue in million euros 297.0. The second highest Revenue in million euros 644.0 was observed for Asia-Pacific in Half 1st half 2019.

On average, the Half 1st half 2019 had the highest Revenue in million euros for all 6 groups Asia-Pacific, Europe, North America, Latin America, Emerging Markets, and Russia/CIS. Whereas 1st half 2017 had the lowest average Revenue in million euros.
